result.title: Concepts for Multi-Paradigm Distributed Transformation
result.description: This deliverable will present the main concepts for scalable model transformations executed over a Cloud-based infrastructure. It will cover a metamodelisation of the space of programming models for distributed data processing. A particular attention will be given to live transformations which are executed in reaction to changes in the environment. Moreover, the underpinning for the composition of transformations like goal, composition operators, and the properties to be maintained during and after the execution of model transformations will be defined and reported
